"}, {"content": " The person who eats healthy food is physically active. This is because eating healthy food contributes to maintaining a good level of physical fitness and overall health. On the other hand, having cerebral palsy does not necessarily mean that a person is less physically active; it depends on the individual's abilities and limitations. However, some people with cerebral palsy may have mobility issues that affect their ability to be as physically active as others.", "role": "assistant"}]
